name: Cucumber
benefits: Cucumber is one of the most water-rich vegetables with extremely low calorie density. Featured in gazpacho and salads. Perfect for preloading meals to reduce overall calorie intake. Checks off high water content and low calorie density criteria.
amount: Unlimited - part of negative calorie foods

quotes: Preload with 'negative calorie' foods... Start each meal with an apple or a Green Light soup or salad containing fewer than 100 calories per cup.
